titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office located at 3813 Main Street in East Chicago, Indiana, as the "Corporal Harold Gomez Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Mr. McHugh moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 5, rule I, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 425 - 0 (Roll No. 491).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 9/23/1998--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Post Office located at 3813 Main Street in East Chicago, Indiana, as the Corporal Harold Gomez Post Office.
